body.name: Boka Classic Manual Toothbrush with Extra Soft Activated-Charcoal, Tapered Bristles, Bioplastic Handle That Includes Travel Cap, Dentist-Approved, Great for Adults and Kids, White (Pack of 1)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 34 mins
features: Activated Charcoal Bristles: Our medium bristles are infused with Binchotan activated-charcoal, which reduces odor and will keep your mouth and teeth clean without the abrasavity of charcoal pastes and powders.

Easy on the Gums: Extra-soft and long tapered bristle design cleans better along the gumline and between the teeth while being easy on the gums, over-brushing with hard bristles can lead to gum recession.
Travel Friendly: Our high-quality brush includes a protective cap to keep the bristles and brush clean so you can take it with you wherever you go.
Environmentally Friendly: Our classic brush features a bioplastic handle.

Boka: Oral care is the foundation of health, but the industry hasn't been treating it that way. Boka pairs the best ingredients nature and modern science have to offer to heal your mouth and nourish your body.
body.description: Health Starts with Your Mouth Oral care is the foundation of health, but the industry hasn't been treating it that way Boka pairs the best ingredients nature and modern science have to offer to heal your mouth and nourish your body. Our Design Philosophy We believe in going back to the basics. You won’t find unnecessary gimmicks here. Our toothbrushes, floss, and toothpaste are made with high-quality materials that deliver a comfortable and effective cleaning.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Health Starts with Your Mouth Oral care is the foundation of health, but the industry hasn't been treating it that way Boka pairs the best ingredients nature and modern science have to offer to heal your mouth and nourish your body. Our Design Philosophy We believe in going back to the basics. You won’t find unnecessary gimmicks here. Our toothbrushes, floss, and toothpaste are made with high-quality materials that deliver a comfortable and effective cleaning. Boka works with your body, not against it Results to Smile About Natural When Possible Ingredients You Can Trust Safe and Effective

Boka Brush The Boka Brush is not only attractive, but also has sonic motor technology to ensure optimal plaque removal. The heads are made with soft nylon and are infused with activated-charcoal for maximum whitening and reduction in bacteria growth. The long-lasting battery provides 4 weeks of brushing between charges. Ela Mint Toothpaste Ela Mint was created to address the “silent epidemic” in healthcare. Instead of fluoride (first used +100 years ago), our toothpaste features nano-hydroxyapatite (n-Ha), a modern evolution in dentistry that’s become a gold standard in Japan for over 40-years. Ela Mint features nano-hydroxyapatite, a modern evolution in medicine and dentistry (the mineral makes up the primary foundation of teeth and bones—that’s why it’s so restorative). Plus, it’s 100% non-toxic and fluoride-free. Rasana Tongue Cleaner The Rasana stainless-steel tongue cleaner is both easy to use and effective. While tongue cleaning has been a tradition in Eastern and Ayurvedic medicine to both reduce bacteria causing bad breath, illness, and improve taste, most people are improperly cleaning their tongue today. Hold cleaner with two hands by each handle and position at the back of the tongue and gently pull. You’ll soon discover why this is the most important oral care routine that you haven’t been doing. Ela Mint Floss Your mouth thanks you for your flossing habit. Your dental bills do as well. Keep your good habit going strong with our natural floss. Made with vegetable wax, it’s Teflon-free, petroleum-free and provides a thorough, satisfying clean.

Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush with Charcoal Bristles Ela Mint Toothpaste Rasana Stainless-Steel Tongue Cleaner Ela Mint Floss Coco Ginger Toothpaste Boka Kit Features n-Ha ✓ ✓ ✓ Safe/Clean/Non-Toxic Ingredients ✓ ✓ ✓ Vegan ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft nice brush
reviews.reviewText: Good brush, does everything you need it too. Soft bristles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this toothbrush!
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with my new toothbrush. The blue color is great and it feels wonderful in my hand, somehow better than other toothbrushes tho I’m not sure why. The size of the head is perfect and I’m thrilled with my purchase. I also love their toothpaste so it’s a win-win!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toothbrush ever
reviews.reviewText: Not only is this toothbrush soft, it has a compact head, which is nice for my tiny mouth. It definitely brightens my teeth. I use it alongside the hello toothpaste which is whitening and natural. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: Very nice soft toothbrush especially if you have sensitive gums. Cleans very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like BOKA products but while their sonic toothbrush is a reasonable price, these manual toothbrushes are very expensive. I make them last as long as possible before buying another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Soft on the gums and the bristles last a long time retaining their straightness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice soft Bristles
reviews.reviewText: Very much like this toothbrush! The handle is nice in the hand and the bristles are easy on the gums. Would recommend buying along with the toothpaste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best manual toothbrush ever.
